episode_summary: This episode covers a range of quirky and historical facts, including a bizarre newspaper promotion for large families, Belgian fishermen using horses, the surprising shapes of mountains, and the ancient origins of 'your mom' jokes.

facts.fact: In 1921, the News of the World offered a free tea tray to any mother on the birth of her 10th child.
Belgian fishermen go fishing on horseback, and they drown in their thousands.
68% of mountains don't have pointy peaks.
The oldest 'your mom' joke appears on a 3500-year-old Babylonian tablet.
